txt.en: Mr. Swatmidge, I trust that you are well, and I thank you for sending someone to help out around my farm. Those bears have become most importunate, but not as importunate as you, sir. I must regretfully (yet forcefully) refuse your (many) recent proposals of courtship. I must ask that you abandon this pursuit, and bid you good day.\n\nAsphodel Froghorn
